qgis 0.18.0

QGIS algorithm Slope, aspect, curvature

Source: R/saga_slopeaspectcurvature.R
saga_slopeaspectcurvature.Rd

QGIS Algorithm provided by SAGA Slope, aspect, curvature (saga:slopeaspectcurvature)

saga_slopeaspectcurvature(
  ELEVATION = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  METHOD = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  UNIT_SLOPE = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  UNIT_ASPECT = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  SLOPE = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  ASPECT = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_GENE = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_PLAN = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_PROF = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_TANG = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_LONG = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_CROS = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_MINI = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_MAXI = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_TOTA = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  C_ROTO = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  ...,
  .complete_output = TRUE
)

Arguments

ELEVATION

raster - Elevation. Path to a raster layer.
METHOD

enum of ("[0] Maximum Slope (Travis et al. 1975)", "[1] Maximum Triangle Slope (Tarboton 1997)", "[2] Least Squares Fitted Plane (Horn 1981, Costa-Cabral & Burgess 1996)", "[3] 6 parameter 2nd order polynom (Evans 1979)", "[4] 6 parameter 2nd order polynom (Heerdegen & Beran 1982)", "[5] 6 parameter 2nd order polynom (Bauer, Rohdenburg, Bork 1985)", "[6] 9 parameter 2nd order polynom (Zevenbergen & Thorne 1987)", "[7]10 parameter 3rd order polynom (Haralick 1983)") - Method. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
UNIT_SLOPE

enum of ("[0] radians", "[1] degree", "[2] percent") - Slope Units. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
UNIT_ASPECT

enum of ("[0] radians", "[1] degree") - Aspect Units. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.
SLOPE

rasterDestination - Slope. Path for new raster layer.
ASPECT

rasterDestination - Aspect. Path for new raster layer.
C_GENE

rasterDestination - General Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_PLAN

rasterDestination - Plan Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_PROF

rasterDestination - Profile Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_TANG

rasterDestination - Tangential Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_LONG

rasterDestination - Longitudinal Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_CROS

rasterDestination - Cross-Sectional Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_MINI

rasterDestination - Minimal Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_MAXI

rasterDestination - Maximal Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_TOTA

rasterDestination - Total Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
C_ROTO

rasterDestination - Flow-Line Curvature. Path for new raster layer.
...

further parameters passed to qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm()
.complete_output

logical specifing if complete out of qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm() should be used (TRUE) or first output (most likely the main) should read (FALSE). Default value is TRUE.

Details

Outputs description

  • SLOPE - outputRaster - Slope

  • ASPECT - outputRaster - Aspect

  • C_GENE - outputRaster - General Curvature

  • C_PLAN - outputRaster - Plan Curvature

  • C_PROF - outputRaster - Profile Curvature

  • C_TANG - outputRaster - Tangential Curvature

  • C_LONG - outputRaster - Longitudinal Curvature

  • C_CROS - outputRaster - Cross

  • C_MINI - outputRaster - Minimal Curvature

  • C_MAXI - outputRaster - Maximal Curvature

  • C_TOTA - outputRaster - Total Curvature

  • C_ROTO - outputRaster - Flow
